scripts.config: set scripts-prepend-node-path true set legacy-peer-deps true
scripts.build-prev: npm config set legacy-peer-deps true && cd client && npm run build
scripts.build: npm config set legacy-peer-deps true && npm run install-client && npm run build-prev
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm config set legacy-peer-deps true && npm run install-client && npm run build
